TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpListenerElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的 HttpListener 元素。

span.span: Represents the HttpListener element in the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类对应于\ 元素 （网络设置） 配置元素。This class corresponds to the \ Element (Network Settings) configuration element. 此类提供以编程方式访问存储在配置文件的信息。This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files. 属性指示如果使用未经转义的原始 URI，而不是经过转换的 URI 其中任何百分比编码值转换和执行其他任何规范化步骤。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当实例收到的请求通过`http.sys`服务，它创建的提供的 URI 字符串实例`http.sys`，并将其作为公开属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求的 URI 字符串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 经过转换的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是HTTP 请求的请求行中提供：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 提供的原始 URI`http.sys`前面所述的请求是"/ 路径 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示在通过网络发送以下 HTTP 谓词字符串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服务从使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 URI 请求中提供的信息创建经过转换的 URI，并要确定源服务器请求的主机标头应转发到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过比较已注册的 URI 前缀的一组与请求中的信息。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. HTTP Server SDK 文档将作为此转换的 URI [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108)结构。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 以便可以请求与已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较，需要完成一些规范化到请求。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于以上经过转换的 URI 示例将按如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服务结合属性值和要创建一个已转换的 URI 的请求行中的字符串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外，`http.sys`和类还执行以下操作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码的值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将百分比编码为 utf-16 字符表示形式的非 ASCII 字符。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意，Unicode 字符 （Unicode 编码使用 %uxxxx 格式） 以及支持 utf-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤，如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 请求不包含有关使用百分比编码值的编码的任何信息，因为它可能无法确定正确的编码只是通过分析百分比编码值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供了用于修改该过程的两个注册表项：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零，`http.sys`接受只有 UTF-8 编码的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零`http.sys`还接受请求中的 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零`http.sys`始终尝试解码 URL 为 utf-8 第一次; 如果该转换失败，并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零，Http.sys 然后尝试将其解码为 ANSI 或者与 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果为零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零），`http.sys`尝试对其进行解码为 ANSI 或者与 DBCS; 如果该操作不成功，它会尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当收到请求时，它使用从经过转换的 URI`http.sys`作为输入到属性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 没有需要在 Uri 中支持除字符和数字的字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 例如，以下 URI，用于检索客户的客户信息数字"1/3812":An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (%2f) 中的百分号编码斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 这是有必要，请因为在这种情况下包含斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递给 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求的发件人的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果属性设置为 false，然后当收到请求时，它使用的原始 URI 而不是从经过转换的 URI`http.sys`作为输入到属性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Timeouts As HttpListenerTimeoutsElement

summary.span: 获取用于 对象的默认超时元素。

span.span: Gets the default timeout elements used for an object.

value.span: 用于 对象的超时元素。

span.span: The timeout elements used for an object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnescapeRequestUrl As Boolean
public: property bool UnescapeRequestUrl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否使用未经转义的原始 URI，而非经过转换的 URI。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI.

value.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示 是否使用未经转义的原始 URI，而非经过转换的 URI。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI, rather than the converted URI.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性指示如果使用未经转义的原始 URI，而不是经过转换的 URI 其中任何百分比编码值转换和执行其他任何规范化步骤。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当实例收到的请求通过`http.sys`服务，它创建的提供的 URI 字符串实例`http.sys`，并将其作为公开属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求的 URI 字符串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 经过转换的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是HTTP 请求的请求行中提供：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 提供的原始 URI`http.sys`前面所述的请求是"/ 路径 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示在通过网络发送以下 HTTP 谓词字符串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服务从使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 URI 请求中提供的信息创建经过转换的 URI，并要确定源服务器请求的主机标头应转发到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过比较已注册的 URI 前缀的一组与请求中的信息。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. HTTP Server SDK 文档将作为此转换的 URI [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108)结构。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 以便可以请求与已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较，需要完成一些规范化到请求。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于以上经过转换的 URI 示例将按如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服务结合属性值和要创建一个已转换的 URI 的请求行中的字符串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外，`http.sys`和类还执行以下操作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码的值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将百分比编码为 utf-16 字符表示形式的非 ASCII 字符。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意，Unicode 字符 （Unicode 编码使用 %uxxxx 格式） 以及支持 utf-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤，如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 请求不包含有关使用百分比编码值的编码的任何信息，因为它可能无法确定正确的编码只是通过分析百分比编码值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供了用于修改该过程的两个注册表项：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零，`http.sys`接受只有 UTF-8 编码的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零`http.sys`还接受请求中的 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零`http.sys`始终尝试解码 URL 为 utf-8 第一次; 如果该转换失败，并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零，Http.sys 然后尝试将其解码为 ANSI 或者与 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果为零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 为非零），`http.sys`尝试对其进行解码为 ANSI 或者与 DBCS; 如果该操作不成功，它会尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当收到请求时，它使用从经过转换的 URI`http.sys`作为输入到属性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 没有需要在 Uri 中支持除字符和数字的字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 例如，以下 URI，用于检索客户的客户信息数字"1/3812":An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (%2f) 中的百分号编码斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 这是有必要，请因为在这种情况下包含斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递给 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求的发件人的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果属性设置为 false，然后当收到请求时，它使用的原始 URI 而不是从经过转换的 URI`http.sys`作为输入到属性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.
